translation.en: [man over intercom] Number one, step forward and face the mirror.
Have another look at this one, ma'am…
We're talking about violent killings. Murder, ma'am.
Is this not the woman you saw?
Zenzi. Do you… Do you mind if I call you Zenzi?
You've had quite a week, huh?
A trail of bodies all over the damn city.
Dead criminals falling from the sky.
Why did you murder these men?
Eyewitnesses, CCTV cameras, they put you on the scene.
translation.ko: 목격자에 CCTV까지 당신이 현장에 있었다고 가리켜요

translation.en: What the hell are you mixed up in?
So, how's the little guy doing?
-[Zenzi] Who said it was a guy? -I can feel it. I'm sure it's a guy.
translation.ko: - 누가 아들이래? - 느낌이 그래 분명히 아들이야

translation.en: What have I told you? Call me Enrico.
translation.ko: - 안녕하세요, 부이센 씨 - 내가 뭐랬어? 엔리코라고 부르라니까

translation.en: I'm your landlord, but I'm also a friend.
I'll make up the rent. Please.
You know I'm here to help, na?
If we need to put our heads together and, uh, make a plan.
I just don't want to see you out on the street.
And without a man to protect you.
-Good. Maybe now I'll see my money. -[door opens]
translation.ko: 잘됐네, 이제야 집세를 받을 수 있겠어

translation.en: [woman in Afrikaans] Enrico! Where are you?
Ma'am, did you remember that today--
You didn't forget to collect Summer, did you, Zenzi?
translation.ko: 서머 데려오는 거 안 까먹었지, 젠지?

translation.en: Oh! I did. I did. I did. Oh.
[boy in Tswana] It's for Papa when you take me to visit him.
translation.ko: 아빠 만나러 갈 때 줄 거야

translation.en: I need to leave a bit early today.
Come on, he put you through so much.
Sometimes it's best to leave our past behind us.
translation.ko: 과거는 과거로 두는 게 좋을 때도 있어

translation.en: Hello, sir. I'm here to fetch my husband, Maxwell Mwale.
-[pounding on door] -[Zenzi] Okay, okay, I'm coming.
Max Mwale, you're under arrest for the murder of Yazid Noordien.
translation.ko: 맥스웰 므왈레 야지드 살해 혐의로 체포한다

translation.en: -[in Tswana] What's going on? -[in English] I love you.
translation.ko: 여보, 무슨 일이야? 내가 사랑하는 거 알지?

translation.en: -[in English] Move it! -This is a mistake. Wait.
Who are you waiting for, sister?
He was supposed to be released today at 5:00.
It says here he was released this morning.
[scoffs] No. [guard] I don't know what to tell you.
[whispering] Zenzi, do you know what time it is?
-Is this a joke? -No. No. He got out today.
Well, if I saw him, I would chase him away unless he brings the rent.
translation.ko: 내가 봤으면 내쫓았겠지 집세 가져왔으면 모를까

translation.en: Anyway, you're better off without him. Count yourself lucky.
translation.ko: 그런 남편은 없는 게 나아 운 좋은 셈 쳐

translation.en: Did Enrico tell you? We're selling the house.
We don't have a choice anymore.
You're gonna have to find somewhere else to live for free.
translation.ko: 돈 없이도 지낼 곳을 찾아야 할 거야

translation.en: You've got till the end of the month to pack up your things.
[Zenzi] I'd like to report a missing person, please.
[in Afrikaans] Ay. It's these Zimbabweans again.
The husband is off with his mistress, and the wife comes to us to find him.
translation.ko: 남편이 내연녀랑 날랐는데 아내는 우리한테 징징대지

translation.en: -[in English] Cry me a river. -[police officers laugh]
I am not Zimbabwean. I'm from Bethlehem in the Free State.
translation.ko: 난 짐바브웨가 아니라 프리스테이트 베들레헴 출신이고

translation.en: And my husband is not with some mistress.
He got out of jail today. He was supposed to come home, but he didn't.
translation.ko: 오늘 출소하고 집에 와야 할 사람이 안 온 거죠

translation.en: So are you going to help me or not?
Look, these men are trouble, sister.
He's probably out drinking with friends, having a good time.
translation.ko: 어디 가서 친구들과 술이나 퍼마시고 있겠죠

translation.en: Don't leave a voicemail. Just text me. Thanks, bye.
translation.ko: 음성 메시지 말고 문자나 남겨요, 그럼 이만

translation.en: Hi. I'm looking for this guy,

translation.ko: 맥스라고 하는데 혹시 본 적 있으세요?

translation.en: I'm looking for this guy. Have you seen him? Max.
translation.ko: 이 남자 본 적 있어요? 이름이 맥스예요
잠깐만요 - 맥스를 알아요? - 맥스는 감옥에 있잖아

translation.en: -No, no, he got out. -Well, he's not here.
You need a new man to warm your bed, eh? [chuckles]
translation.ko: - 침대 달궈 줄 남자 필요해? - 아니요

translation.en: Well, if Max isn't in jail, he's dead.
So fuck him. And fuck you!
What are you playing, coming here?
I was just trying to find my husband.
He wasn't at the prison, and he didn't come home.
I don't know where to look anymore.
[sighs] No one will help me. I will help you.
I… I really need to get home.
I should fix that door for you.
Oh, no, it's okay. I'm already used to it.
-[Enrico] Zenzi, open the door. -[banging on door]
[Enrico] Zenzi, I'm just trying to help you.
[Alice in Afrikaans] Enrico! Leave that bloody maid, before I put you both on the street!
translation.ko: 엔리코, 종년은 내버려 둬 둘 다 확 내쫓아 버리기 전에

translation.en: No wonder he's not coming back. Anything to get away from you.
translation.ko: 이러니 남편도 떠났지 뭔들 붙어 있겠어?

translation.en: You do realize that if you are lying, not only are you in contempt of court,
translation.ko: 거짓 진술일 시에는 법정 모독죄에 해당하고

translation.en: but you're leaving the real criminals on the street?
[in Tswana] I am your wife, Max.
I know who you really are.
translation.ko: 당신이 어떤 사람인지는 내가 잘 알아

translation.en: [in Tswana] Then maybe this is my chance to change.
[in English] What is it you're not telling me?
What are you involved in? Please, whatever it is…
translation.ko: 무슨 일이길래 그래? 뭐가 됐든 간에…

translation.en: I thought it was somebody important.
If living in your own filth is so important,
[groans] Well, you did come all this way.
I see you have been writing.
It's juice. I know what's good for me.
After a week-long search led by local police,
translation.ko: 지역 경찰은 일주일에 걸친 수색 끝에

translation.en: Garth's body was ultimately recovered near a stream in Philippi.
translation.ko: "탄디와 얘기하세요" 필리피의 하천 근처에서 가스의 시신을 발견했습니다

translation.en: With me today are his daughter, Melanie, and wife, Karen,
translation.ko: 오늘은 따님 멜러니와 아내인 캐런을 모시고

translation.en: who are recounting their harrowing journey
in their hopes of finding justice…
[in Tswana] It's no Felicia, but it hits the spot.
[host on TV] And when did you know he wasn't coming home? That he was dead?
translation.ko: 아버지가 집에 오지 않고 죽었다는 건 언제 알았나요?

translation.en: [Melanie on TV] He hadn't called. He always called.
I just looked at my mom, and I knew.
If you want to study humanity,
you should watch daytime TV talk shows.
translation.ko: 낮에 하는 TV 토크 쇼를 봐

translation.en: [host] You suspect there might be more to it.
[Melanie] There has to be more to it.
He had enemies. We knew this.
-Please. Look at her. -It has to have been someone he knew.
translation.ko: 저 얼굴을 보고도 그래? 아는 사람이 저지른 짓이에요

translation.en: Well, when you have multiple awards for your investigative journalism,
translation.ko: 네가 탐사 보도로 여러 상을 휩쓸었고

translation.en: and a Sunday Times bestseller, you can be the judge of character around here.
translation.ko: '선데이 타임스' 인기 작가면 그 말도 맞겠지

translation.en: Well, Mr. Ngesi, if I did not clean up after you,
translation.ko: 응게시 씨 내가 여기 청소부니 망정이지

translation.en: I would think you were an arrogant ass. Oh! [laughs]
[in Tswana] There's no underestimating you, Zenzi.
But I can't come in later this week.
A-and I really need to speak to Mr. Hendricks.
[Hendricks] I pay you to solve my problems.
translation.ko: 내 돈 받고 하는 일이 뭐야?

translation.en: I don't pay you so I can solve my own problems. So fucking solve it.
Whoa, whoa, whoa, Zenzi, what the fuck are you doing here? What day is it?
translation.ko: 젠지, 근무일도 아닌데 왜 여기 있어?

translation.en: Sorry, Mr. Hendricks. Nancy said I can work today.
translation.ko: 죄송해요, 헨드릭스 씨 낸시가 일해도 된대서요

translation.en: Okay, but you're not supposed to see this shit.
translation.ko: 알았어, 대신 이건 못 본 셈 치는 거야

translation.en: You can keep your mouth shut, right?
I know what you do here, sir. I've worked here for a while now.
translation.ko: 걱정 마세요 - 그 정도 눈치는 있어요 - 그건 아는데…

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I know. Just… [grumbles]
translation.ko: - 그 정도 눈치는 있어요 - 그건 아는데…

translation.en: …mind your own business and clean something.
translation.ko: 그냥 하던 일이나 해 청소나 하든가

translation.en: "Keep it away from Zenzi. Just let her clean."
translation.ko: 얌전히 청소만 시키라고 맥스가 그렇게 당부했는데

translation.en: That's all Max asked for. What the fuck am I supposed to do?
translation.ko: 얌전히 청소만 시키라고 맥스가 그렇게 당부했는데 나더러 어쩌란 건지

translation.en: You've been good to us, sir.
Um, I've been meaning to ask, sir--
I can't give you another advance, Zenzi. I wish this was my money, but it's not.
translation.ko: 더 이상 가불은 안 돼 이게 내 돈이면 좋겠지만 아니거든

translation.en: -Max is in jail. -No, he got out.
Nobody fucking told me. Somebody's getting cut up for this.
translation.ko: 이것들이 말을 안 해? 썰어 버리든가 해야지

translation.en: You know Max is welcome here, right? So where the fuck is he?
translation.ko: 맥스한테도 여기가 좋을 텐데 어디로 갔다는 거야?

translation.en: That's what I'm asking you, sir.
I went to fetch him yesterday, but…
he wasn't there. I… I… I can't find him.
translation.ko: 거기선 이미 나갔대고 그이는 보이질 않아요

translation.en: you and me, we need to find Max.
There's a lot of shit happening out there, okay? A lot of unfinished business.
translation.ko: 바깥은 위험해 해결 안 된 일들이 많아

translation.en: And would, uh, would Jackson know?
Jackson Thom is no partner of mine, okay? He's a fucking sociopath.
translation.ko: 그놈은 파트너도 뭣도 아니고 소시오패스 새끼야

translation.en: Stay away from him. He's dangerous. And Max owes him money.
translation.ko: 위험한 놈이니 멀리해 맥스가 놈한테 빚졌어

translation.en: And if Jackson knows Max is out, that is a bad move for Max.
translation.ko: 맥스가 나온 걸 알면 잭슨이 가만 안 둘 거야

translation.en: You and me, we're gonna stay far away from Jackson. You hear me?
translation.ko: 우리 둘 다 잭슨을 멀리하는 게 좋아, 알았어?

translation.en: Those fuckers moved on us. Jackson's guys.
You… You get out of here, okay?
Leave it with me. I'll find Max.

translation.ko: - 다음 주에 뵐게요 - 조지프는 어디 있어?

translation.en: -[Hendricks] Where the fuck is Joseph? -[man] We don't know. He wasn't there.
translation.ko: - 다음 주에 뵐게요 - 조지프는 어디 있어? 몰라요, 밖에 없었어요

translation.en: Do you know where I can find Jackson Thom?
-[injured man grunting] -[Hendricks] Bite on this. Bite! Fuck.
translation.ko: 이거 물고 있어 - 젠장 - 낸시, 제발요

translation.en: Do you remember that night when I told Bevan that you were with me?
translation.ko: 일전에 내가 베번한테 당신과 있다고 둘러댔죠

translation.en: Yeah, the boss is over there.
Am I supposed to know you? Who sent you?
What do you do? Clean his toilets?
You're Max's little wife. You don't need to answer. I know that.
translation.ko: 맥스의 아내지? 대답할 필요 없어, 이미 아니까

translation.en: It's my business to know things.
translation.ko: 그런 걸 아는 게 내 일이야

translation.en: I've been sitting here, waiting for him to knock on my door.
translation.ko: 난 여기 앉아서 놈이 찾아오길 기다렸어

translation.en: am I going to need collateral?
if collateral didn't just walk into my workshop.
translation.ko: 담보가 내 작업장에 굴러 들어온 건가?

translation.en: -It has nothing to do with me. -Oh, that's where you're wrong.
translation.ko: - 나랑은 상관없는 일이에요 - 거기서부터 틀렸다는 거야

translation.en: It's got everything to do with you.
Until Max pays me, whatever's Max's is mine.
translation.ko: 맥스가 돈을 갚기 전까지 그놈이 가진 건 다 내 거야

translation.en: And I might as well enjoy it.
[Zenzi] Don't come closer. I'll… I'll just leave.
No, no, no, no, no, no. No.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 이럴 순 없어 이건 아니야

translation.en: You were right. The daughter killed her father.
translation.ko: 네 말대로 딸이 아버지를 죽인 거야

translation.en: I don't know how you knew it, but you hit the nail right on the head.
translation.ko: 어떻게 알았는진 몰라도 사람을 제대로 봤어

translation.en: Well, actually, I wanted to speak to you about a new idea for a book.
translation.ko: 새로 쓸 책에 대한 얘기를 하고 싶은데

translation.en: [sighs] Maybe better when you get here.
I think you're actually gonna like this one.
[inhales sharply] I'll call you later, okay?
Just drop by when you get the--
[Mr. Ngesi] What do we really know about the invisible women in our lives?
translation.ko: 우리 삶에서 보이지 않는 여성들을 얼마나 잘 알고 있을까?

translation.en: sweep our floors, know us better than we know ourselves,
translation.ko: 우리 바닥을 쓸고 우리 자신보다 우리를 잘 안다

translation.en: sometimes more than we'd like to admit.
translation.ko: 우리가 허용하는 그 이상을 알 때도 있다

translation.en: How often do we reach out into their lives
translation.ko: 반면에 우리는 얼마나 그들의 삶에 관여할까?

translation.en: the way they seamlessly move in and out of ours?
translation.ko: 하물며 그들처럼 잡음 없이 드나드는 게 가능한가?

translation.en: Do we dare to look outside of our self-involved lives?
translation.ko: 우리는 과연 우리 삶의 테두리를 벗어나서 볼 수 있을까?

translation.en: But one momentary interaction can remind even an aging narcissist
translation.ko: 짧게나마 교감이 이뤄지면 나이 든 나르시시스트조차 타인의 삶을 돌아본다

translation.en: that there's life outside of our own.
translation.ko: 나이 든 나르시시스트조차 타인의 삶을 돌아본다

translation.en: I want to write a new story.
translation.ko: 나는 새로운 이야기를 쓰고 싶다 "눈에 띄지 않는 여자"

translation.en: The story of a woman, softly-spoken, unremarkable
but with a dignity of strength I haven't often seen,
who's taken knock after knock but finds the strength to get back up,
translation.ko: 몇 번을 쓰러져도 다시 일어날 힘을 지닌 여자다

translation.en: a woman I'd like to call a friend.
To a younger man, maybe even more.
translation.ko: 나이가 맞았다면 애정을 느꼈을지 모르는 여자

translation.en: Who's seen the worst of heartbreak, but who has resolved to live,
translation.ko: 비통한 상황 속에서도 삶의 의지를 다잡으며

translation.en: to live with the best of hearts and make the right decisions, always.
translation.ko: 항상 최선을 다해 올바른 결정을 내리려는 여자

translation.en: [Mr. Ngesi] What will happen to this woman
when the world around her is in chaos…
[Hendricks] Quick! Get those boxes out of here.
[Mr. Ngesi] …when her limits are tested, her principles,
when her back is against the wall?
-Then we'll see who she really is. -[Hendricks] You, hurry up!
translation.ko: 그때야 비로소 진짜 모습이 나올 것이다

translation.en: Zenzi, this is not a good time.
Nancy, move it. This is the first place they're gonna come to.
translation.ko: 낸시, 어서 옮겨 여기부터 먼저 덮칠 거야

translation.en: They're coming right fucking now. Twenty minutes max. Wipe the drives.
Joseph, you take the car and get out of here.
If they're gonna search this place, the only thing they're gonna find
translation.ko: 놈들이 이곳을 뒤져 봤자 최고급 토마호크 스테이크나 나오고 말 거야

translation.en: is the finest cuts of tomahawk steaks, you get me?
translation.ko: 최고급 토마호크 스테이크나 나오고 말 거야

translation.en: You shouldn't be here right now.
Okay, motherfuckers, move it! It's day zero!
translation.ko: 이 새끼들아, 빨리 움직여 지금부터 시작이야

translation.en: The guy you came to ask about just a few hours ago, he's dead.
translation.ko: 몇 시간 전 네가 물어본 남자가 지금은 죽었다고

translation.en: But somehow I get the feeling you already know that, don't you?
translation.ko: 넌 알고 있었던 것 같네, 맞지?

translation.en: The whole fucking city's gonna think that I did it and with my own gun.
translation.ko: 사방팔방에서 내가 내 총으로 죽인 줄 알 거야

translation.en: And don't you say a fucking word, you got me?
Uys and Van der Merwe, I want you in there. Thorough checks, okay?
translation.ko: 너희 둘은 저쪽으로 가서 샅샅이 뒤져

translation.en: Twala, Bennett, that side. Even the freezers.
translation.ko: 트왈라, 베넷은 저쪽 냉동고 안까지 살펴봐

translation.en: You, I want you in there.
Check hard drives, files, boxes, computers…
translation.ko: 하드 드라이브, 파일, 상자 컴퓨터도 확인해

translation.en: Come on. The rest follow me.
I want you on that side. Bring me anything significant.
translation.ko: 저쪽에 가서 중요해 보이는 건 다 가져와

translation.en: You sure no one followed you?
[Joseph] Got out just in time, I guess.
-What's going on, boss? -[Hendricks] I wish I fucking knew.
translation.ko: - 어떻게 된 일이에요? - 나도 알면 좋게

translation.en: -Somehow Max is right in the middle of it. -Max?
She took my gun and some cash, and now Jackson is dead.
translation.ko: 내 총과 돈을 가져가더니 잭슨이 죽었어

translation.en: Everyone is gonna think it was us.
[Blessing on phone] You've really fucked things up now, huh?
What part of "keep the peace" don't you motherfuckers understand?
translation.ko: 조용히 몸 사리라는 말도 못 알아 처먹어?

translation.en: [Blessing] Yes, you are. Come and see me.
You were at Raymond Hendricks's business earlier today.
even though it wasn't my day to work.
I was going because I was trying to find my husband.
Mr. Hendricks couldn't help me either.
translation.ko: 헨드릭스 씨도 별 도움은 안 됐지만요

translation.en: I don't know why I took it.
I wasn't even thinking. I was just trying to find Max.
[detective] We have reason to believe Raymond's involved in organized criminal activity.
Did you see any drugs at the butchery or weapons?
Does the name "Jackson Thom" mean anything to you?
[detective] He was found dead today, and we think it was a gangland hit.
translation.ko: 오늘 죽은 채 발견됐는데 갱단의 짓이 아닐까 해요

translation.en: We think your husband could be involved.
translation.ko: 당신 남편이 연루됐을 가능성도 생각해 두고 있어요

translation.en: When's the last time you saw him?
[detective] Do you perhaps have a recent photograph of him?
[Zenzi] Do you know where I can find Jackson Thom?
If you hear from your husband,
if you see him, if you can think of anything,
I can help you out of a scene you don't want to be any part of.
translation.ko: 이런 일에 휘말리기 싫으면 내가 도와줄게요

translation.en: Are you gonna tell me what happened?
We cannot have that type of disruption happening here.
If you are involved in something, we cannot have it.
translation.ko: 시끄러운 일 생기는 거 우리로선 사양이야

translation.en: And I'm not involved in anything.
you've gotta stand up for yourself.
I am not a killer for hire.
[man] So far so good, I say.

translation.ko: 어디를 드나들어도 의심 한번 안 샀지

translation.en: [man] Do it, and you get paid for your trouble.
translation.ko: 시키는 대로 하면 돈이라도 받아 챙기지

translation.en: …and the police might learn who really pulled the trigger on Jackson Thom.
translation.ko: 누가 잭슨 톰을 죽였는지 경찰이 알게 될 거야

translation.en: They will believe it's Max. My husband is not a murderer.
translation.ko: - 맥스라고 하면 믿겠지 - 내 남편은 살인자가 아니야

translation.en: He should've taken the money and done the time like he was told.
But Max… Max had to fuck around with the wrong people.
translation.ko: 맥스 그 자식은 엄한 놈들을 건드리고 다녔어

translation.en: Who did Max take the fall for?
Why? [man] All you need to know is
translation.ko: - 이유가 뭐야? - 넌 이것만 알면 돼

translation.en: if Max hadn't stepped out of line, your son would still be alive.
translation.ko: 맥스가 선만 지켰어도 네 아들은 살았을 거란 거야

translation.en: The boy didn't have to die. It's all Max's fault.
translation.ko: 아까운 목숨만 날렸지 전부 맥스 탓이야

translation.en: [announcer over PA system] The next train does not stop here.
What happened to Esulu could easily happen--

translation.ko: 내 아들 이름 함부로 입에 올리지 마

translation.en: Did he even shed a tear when he found out his soft little son was dead?
translation.ko: 아들이 죽었다는 사실을 알고도 눈물을 흘렸을까?
